thread.title: All-in-one license cuts hassle for businesses (Shanghai Municipal Government)
thread.title_full: All-in-one license cuts hassle for businesses (Shanghai Municipal Government) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: All-in-one license cuts hassle for businesses (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) Starting from October 1, local authorities began to integrate business license, organization code certificate and tax registration certificate into a single license with a unique social credit code.
